sentences.english: I'll try my best to rout out a good goalkeeper for our football team.
sentences.chinese: 我愿尽力为我们的足球队物色一位优秀的守门员。

sentences.english: What is your favourite soccer team?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢的足球队是哪一支？

sentences.english: I'm afraid our football team was really plastered  last week.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我们的足球队上星期真的被打得落花流水。

sentences.english: Our football team leads them by two goals.
sentences.chinese: 他只是足球队的候补队员。

sentences.english: The Yanlord residents team will be selected from among those who sign up to participate.
sentences.chinese: 仁恒居民足球队由报名的居民筛选产生。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about your soccer team?
sentences.chinese: 能跟我们谈谈你的足球队吗？

sentences.english: Spain's triumphant national football team has returned home from South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙国家足球队从南非得胜荣归。

sentences.english: Ghana has become the first African team to win the Under-20 World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 迦纳成为首个赢得20岁以下世界杯的足球队。

sentences.english: The football team was disciplined by a professional trainer.
sentences.chinese: 这支足球队受过专业教练员的训练。

sentences.english: He made the second string on the footBall team.
sentences.chinese: 他只是足球队的候补队员。

sentences.english: because I played on until... what was, until this year, the worst soccer team in our school's history.
sentences.chinese: 因为我踢球的时候，我们学校足球队处于最差的时代。

sentences.english: Zhang Yue is the captain of the football team.
Children root for their local football (soccer) team in Dublin.
sentences.chinese: 都柏林的孩子们正在为他们的当地足球队呐喊助威。

sentences.english: A teacher at a school for blind kids is taking his school's soccer team to an "away game".
sentences.chinese: 一个盲校的老师带着学校的足球队出去“客场作战”。
我还可以把他们训练成一支足球队。

sentences.english: Saadi, perhaps the best-known brother, captained the national soccer team.
sentences.chinese: 可能最声明远扬是萨阿迪，国家足球队队长。

definition: abbr. for 男子足球 men's soccer/abbr. for 男子足球隊|男子足球队 men's soccer team
men's volleyball/abbr. for 男子排球
club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
soccer association/soccer federation/abbr. for 足球協會|足球协会[zu2 qiu2 xie2 hui4]
cheerleading squad/also written 啦啦隊|啦啦队
